description:
A set of items that increase their user's stats.

Life Droplet x 10
Power Droplet x 10
Defense Droplet x 10
Magic Droplet x 10 
Spirit Droplet x 10

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Droplet Set 1
